titles: A letter from Exon to his friend, Mr. T. Wills, in London, concerning the landing of the French July 26 ; with the particulars of the burning the town of Tingmouth, &c.
author: Lamplugh, Thomas, 1615-1691.
Wills, T.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
keywords: Grand Alliance, War of the, 1689-1697 --  Campaigns --  England.
